DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Repetition Number PCORnet CDM Patient Reported Outcome Item Sequence Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity._Arbitrary ID/sequence number used to link PRO item responses that are associated with the same measure/form.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Repetition Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity.

Concepts.definition: An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per  model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Patient Reported Outcome Item Sequence Number
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Arbitrary ID/sequence number used to link PRO item responses that are associated with the same measure/form.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model
